messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Migration Alert

Due to space-winter, not more than 15 mice have swarmed into the maintenance areas.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Lifesign Alert

Unknown biological entities have been detected near Cum Crater, please stand-by.

messages.author: Bridge
messages.body: The stations mission is to build  DNA vault lets get to it people

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Nanotrasen Bounty Program

Central Command has issued a high-priority cargo bounty. Details have been sent to all bounty consoles.

messages.author: Bridge
messages.body: Good news everyone! its almost time to end this shift!
